alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Morrow; Richland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 10:21PM EDT until July 17 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Richland County in north central Ohio... Northeastern Morrow County in north central Ohio... Southeastern Crawford County in north central Ohio... * Until 1045 PM EDT. * At 1020 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Galion, or 10 miles southeast of Bucyrus, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Galion, Ontario, Lexington, Crestline and Iberia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
